origin: Old English docga, of unknown origin.

definitions.definition: a domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout, an acute sense of smell, non-retractable claws, and a barking, howling, or whining voice.
an unpleasant, contemptible, or wicked man.
definitions.example: he was interrupted by cries of ‘dirty dog!’

definitions.definition: used in names of dogfishes, e.g. sandy dog, spur-dog.
barriers used to keep horses off a particular part of the track.

definitions.example: photographers seemed to dog her every step

definitions.definition: act lazily; fail to try one's hardest.
definitions.example: Eric had a reputation for dogging it a little
she has dogged the door shut
